formalpara.title: Figure 4. Structure of the DSL domain and EGF repeats from the human ligand Jagged1.
formalpara.para: Ribbon diagram of DSL domain and EGF repeats 1-3 from human Jagged1 (PDB ID: 2VJ2). The DSL domain is colored yellow, and EGF repeats one, two, and three are colored cyan, green, and magenta, respectively. Disulfide bonds are shown as grey sticks.
